[quote name='CliftonM']Are you talking about the health thing?[/QUOTE]

No, I still have that open on my Iphone- great idea for just a general background, but I still think it isn't enough to warrant adding Surgeon... unless that person sends a real life set of medical sensors to the flight crew, have them attach it to themselves and then connect it to the computer to send the medical data back to him. If that happens then the guy reading that is surgeon... but unless that happens there's not enough.
